pages.text: To generalize, there are 4 categories of "machine":$(li)Generators make energy$(li)Cables move energy$(li)Battery Boxes store energy$(li)Machines spend energy$(br2)On the right, a $(l:ftbic:generators/basic)Basic Generator$() is making Zaps, $(item)LV Cables$() are sending it to an $(l:ftbic:machines/battery_box)LV Battery Box$(), and then to a $(l:ftbic:machines/macerator)Macerator$() and $(l:ftbic:machines/powered_furnace)Powered Furnace$().
